name: GARBAGEMAN cassette
description:
Garbageman was:
Scott & Justin from Double Negative. 
Sam from Nine Fingered Thug & Picasso Trigger.
Mike from Shiny Beast. 

Mike, Justin and Scott handled all the guitars and vocals. 
Sam handled the pounding away on drum shrapnel.

They were around for about a year: 1991-1992. 

The band was a reaction to the Chapel Hill/Merge scene.

Scott created a scene war "Raleigh vs Chapel Hill" which is detailed in the book: Our Noise: The Story of Merge Records

The recording was done in 1992. They never paid the studio. They never released it.

Scott says:
What's it sound like? Our disdain of the "indie" scene in Chapel Hill.
